thread.title: BRIEF-Coporacion America Airports S.A. Announces Pricing Of Initial Public Offering

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Coporacion America Airports S.A. Announces Pricing Of Initial Public Offering

organizations.name: brief-coporacion america airports s.a. announces pricing of initial public offering feb

text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Corporacion America Airports Sa:
* COPORACION AMERICA AIRPORTS S.A. ANNOUNCES PRICING OF INITIAL PUBLIC OFFERING
* CORPORACION AMERICA AIRPORTS SA - ‍PRICING OF ITS INITIAL PUBLIC OFFERING OF 28.6 MILLION COMMON SHARES OF COMPANY AT $17.00 PER COMMON SHARE​
* CORPORACION AMERICA AIRPORTS SA - IN IPO CO IS SELLING 11.9 MILLION SHARES AND SELLING SHAREHOLDER IS SELLING 16.7 MILLION SHARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
